name: Separation Anxiety Disorder
chief_complaint: I don't want to go to school, I miss my mom too much
symptoms: excessive distress when separated from primary caregiver
reluctance to sleep away from home
physical complaints when separation is anticipated
prognosis: Good with early intervention, symptoms often improve by adolescence
description: A developmentally inappropriate and excessive fear or anxiety concerning separation from those to whom the individual is attached, typically beginning in early childhood and causing significant impairment in social, academic, or other areas of functioning.
